name: @midnight-pay/pay-api
description: MidnightPay - API Layer for Privacy-Preserving Payment Gateway
author: Midnight Developer

scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && npm run typecheck:test
scripts.copy-keys-to-ui: mkdir -p ../pay-ui/public/keys ../pay-ui/public/zkir && cp public/keys/* ../pay-ui/public/keys/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp public/zkir/* ../pay-ui/public/zkir/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'Payment circuit keys copied from pay-api to pay-ui'
